Monologue.Current: Девочка{Line}“Мы говорили о том,{Line} какой огромный наш мир!”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“We were just talking about{Line} how big the world is.”

Monologue.Current: Девочка{Line}“Было бы так замечательно...”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“It must be wonderful...”

Monologue.Current: Девочка{Line}“...путешествовать, объехать{Line} все стороны света!..”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“...To be able to travel far and wide.”

Monologue.Current: “В последнее время{Line} мои руки стали трястись.”
Monologue.Original: “My poor hands{Line} have begun to shake lately.”

Monologue.Current: “Похоже, теперь моя рыбалка{Line} пойдёт под откос...”
Monologue.Original: “I feel like my fishin’s{Line} goin’ downhill now.”

Monologue.Current: “В былые дни, я мог наловить{Line} целую кучу этой... как её?..{Line} Баламбской рыбы.{Line} И делился с этим котом.”
Monologue.Original: “Back in the days, I’d use to catch a whole{Line} bunch o’them Balamb fish and share’em{Line} with this here cat.”

Monologue.Current: “Давным-давно... на заре сотворения мира{Line} жил могучий бог, именуемый «Хайном».”
Monologue.Original: “Long, long ago...{Line} When this world was just made,{Line} there was a strong god named ‘Hyne’.”

Monologue.Current: Девочка{Line}“Дальше! Дальше!..”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“And, and...”

Monologue.Current: “Был он силён и могуч, но{Line} после сотен лет сражений{Line} с кошмарными тварями, устал.”
Monologue.Original: “This god was very, very strong, but{Line} after fighting a lot of monsters,{Line} he became very tired.”

Monologue.Current: “И сотворил он ‘людей’, таких ка ты или я.{Line} И заставил детей своих делать свою работу,{Line} а сам ушёл на покой.”
Monologue.Original: “So he made ‘people’ like you and me to{Line} do all the work, and the god went to sleep.”

Monologue.Current: Девочка{Line}“Тоесть уснул?”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“So he took a nap?”

Monologue.Current: “Верно. А когда проснулся он спустя{Line} многие поколения, то удивился, узрев{Line} как же много стало людей...”
Monologue.Original: “That’s right. However, the god was very{Line} surprised when he awoke. Surprised that{Line} there were so many people.”

Monologue.Current: Девчока{Line}“Да, нас очень много!”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“Yeah, there are so many in this world.”

Monologue.Current: “И тогда Хайн решил, что не нужно{Line} ему столько последователей.{Line} И стал он забирать детей человеческих...”
Monologue.Original: “Hyne decided to reduce the number of people{Line} by taking away the children.”

Monologue.Current: Девочка{Line}“Т-таких, как... я?..”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“You mean...children like me...?”

Monologue.Current: “Именно таких. Страшно?{Pause 48}{Line} И люди тогда были напуганы.”
Monologue.Original: “Uh huh. Scary, isn’t it?{Pause 48}{Line} ...Of course, everyone was scared then, too.”

Monologue.Current: “И люди востали! Началась битва!{Line} И хотя были его дети слабы и малы,{Line} но унаследовали толику божественной{Line} мощи, закалились в горнилах войны{Line} с монстрами, и смогли побороть его!”
Monologue.Original: “And so, the battle against Hyne began.{Line} Even though the people were small, they all{Line} got together, and finally cornered him.”

Monologue.Current: Девочка{Line}“Ух ты!”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“Wow!”

Monologue.Current: “Загнанный в угол, Хайн сделал{Line} единственное, на что у него оставались{Line} силы - разделил себе на две части,{Line} и пока люди раздирали одну половину,{Line} другая успела улизнуть.”
Monologue.Original: “Hyne didn’t know what to do.{Line} Out of desperation, he gave half of his body{Line} to the people and ran off with the{Line} remaining other half.”

Monologue.Current: Девочка{Line}“Ой, а так можно?”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“He can do that?”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, он всё-таки был богом...{Pause 48}{Line} Так или иначе, Хайн{Line} обманул людей.”
Monologue.Original: “Well, he was a god.{Pause 48}{Line} Anyway, it turns out{Line} Hyne tricked the people.”

Monologue.Current: “Часть Хайна спаслась от гнева{Line} потомков и унесла с собой{Line} великую силу творца.”
Monologue.Original: “The half that Hyne ran away with{Line} was the half that had the stronger magic.”

Monologue.Current: Девчока{Line}“Так...{Pause 64}{Line} Значит сбежавшую часть{Line} так никто и не нашёл?”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“Wow...{Pause 64}{Line} So we still can’t find{Line} the other half that ran away???”

Monologue.Current: “Хм... Возможно, и искать не нужно...{Line} Она может быть совсем рядом...{Line} Сидит. Ждёт... Следит за тобой...”
Monologue.Original: “Hmm...{Line} It might be close by, actually.{Line} It might even be watching you.”

Monologue.Current: “Какую историю хочешь услышать{Line} дальше? Весёлую? Или снова страшную?”
Monologue.Original: “What kind of story would you like to{Line} hear next? A fun one?{Line} Or how about another scary one?”

Monologue.Current: Girl{Line}“You’re a SeeD, aren’t you?”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“You’re a SeeD, aren’t you?”

Monologue.Current: “Then go get that jerk kid{Line} who lives next door!”
Monologue.Original: “Then go get that jerk kid{Line} who lives next door!”

Monologue.Current: “He scared me again{Line} by the hill!”
Monologue.Original: “He scared me again{Line} by the hill!”

Monologue.Current: Мальчик{Line}“Мы рассматриваем атлас.{Line} Наш островок такой маленький{Line} в сравнении с остальным миром!”
Monologue.Original: Boy{Line}“We’re looking at the world atlas.{Line} Just contemplating how small{Line} we are in relation to everything.”

Monologue.Current: “Взгляните!{Line} Вот тут могучая республика {Term Galbadia},{Line} а здесь таинственная страна {Term Esthar}...”
Monologue.Original: “Look at this atlas.{Line} You have the powerful nation {Term Galbadia},{Line} a mysterious country called {Term Esthar}...”

Monologue.Current: “И уничтоженная {Term Centra}...”
Monologue.Original: “And{Line} the destroyed {Term Centra}...”

Monologue.Current: Мальчик{Line}“Интересно, как появился{Line} наш мир?..”
Monologue.Original: Boy{Line}“I wonder how this{Line} world came about?”

Monologue.Current: Мальчик{Line}“Я хочу докопаться до правды,{Line} отделить правду от сказок...”
Monologue.Original: Boy{Line}“I wish I could separate the{Line} truth and myth behind all this.”

Monologue.Current: Girl{Line}“I want to play cards, too,{Line} but I don’t have any.”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“I want to play cards, too,{Line} but I don’t have any.”

Monologue.Current: “I wish daddy would{Line} give me his cards.”
Monologue.Original: “I wish daddy would{Line} give me his cards.”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“This world{Line} sure is huge!”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“This world{Line} sure is huge!”

Monologue.Current: “The jokers who were here{Line} were from a country called {Term Galbadia}.”
Monologue.Original: “The jokers who were here{Line} were from a country called {Term Galbadia}.”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“I’m gonna be just like you Zell,{Line} and take on jokers from other countries!”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“I’m gonna be just like you Zell,{Line} and take on jokers from other countries!”

Monologue.Current: Boy{Line}“This is where {Term Galbadia} is.{Line} You know, the country that{Line} occupied {Term Balamb} for a while.”
Monologue.Original: Boy{Line}“This is where {Term Galbadia} is.{Line} You know, the country that{Line} occupied {Term Balamb} for a while.”

Monologue.Current: “Did you see the size of that{Line} {Term Galbadia} Garden?”
Monologue.Original: “Did you see the size of that{Line} {Term Galbadia} Garden?”

Monologue.Current: Boy{Line}“So I guess {Term Balamb} and {Term Galbadia} Garden{Line} used to be shelters.”
Monologue.Original: Boy{Line}“So I guess {Term Balamb} and {Term Galbadia} Garden{Line} used to be shelters.”

Monologue.Current: Girl{Line}“{Term Galbadia} Garden came{Line} from so far away.”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“{Term Galbadia} Garden came{Line} from so far away.”

Monologue.Current: Girl{Line}“I hope they never come back again.”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“I hope they never come back again.”

Monologue.Current: Girl{Line}“Mommy and Daddy{Line} are back at the hotel.”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“Mommy and Daddy{Line} are back at the hotel.”

Monologue.Current: “I helped them with some cleaning, too!”
Monologue.Original: “I helped them with some cleaning, too!”

Monologue.Current: Girl{Line}“So, please do stay at the{Line} lovely Balamb Hotel.”
Monologue.Original: Girl{Line}“So, please do stay at the{Line} lovely Balamb Hotel.”

Monologue.Current: Grandpa{Line}“With everything that happened,{Line} I’m glad everyone is safe.”
Monologue.Original: Grandpa{Line}“With everything that happened,{Line} I’m glad everyone is safe.”

Monologue.Current: “I’m glad to see all of you{Line} are all right as well.”
Monologue.Original: “I’m glad to see all of you{Line} are all right as well.”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, это карты моего папы...{Line} Но, думаю, можно немножко поиграть.”{Line}Хорошо{Line}Не стоит
Monologue.Original: “These are my daddy’s cards but...{Line} I’ll play with you for a little while.”{Line}Yes{Line}No
